pages.title: The Heart
pages.text: $(b)Take the place between breaths$() and trace the $(gold)Circle$().$(br)With the $(item)Barrier Seal$(), bind its Name; with $(item)sanctified chalk$(), seal its edge.$(br2)The Circle is a covenantâ€”make no mark in haste.

pages.title: The Wardens
pages.text: Plant the four $(thing)Wardens$() upon the Cross of the World, each $(gold)five strides$() from the Heart.$(br)Give heed to the compass, for a Warden misplaced shall answer no call.$(br2)Each obelisk must be placed precisely at the cardinal directions: North, East, South, and West, exactly 5 blocks from the barrier circle center.

pages.title: The Language of Stones
pages.text: Once your obelisks are placed, you must awaken their runes using the $(obelisk)Chisel$(reset).$(br2)$(b)Right-click$(reset) each obelisk to cycle through its seven variants, each carrying different ritual meaning:$(br)$(obelisk)Variant 0:$(reset) Blank (invalid)$(br)$(obelisk)Variant 1-3:$(reset) Strength and regeneration$(br)$(obelisk)Variant 4:$(reset) Shield rune (barrier mode)$(br)$(obelisk)Variant 5:$(reset) Poison rune (effect mode)$(br)$(obelisk)Variant 6:$(reset) Regeneration rune (effect mode)$(br)$(obelisk)Variant 7:$(reset) Blessing rune (effect mode)$(br2)Study the $(obelisk)Obelisk Variants$(reset) chapter to understand the complete ritual configuration system.

pages.title: The Sign Above
pages.text: Where the rite is true, the firmament mirrors the earth: a sigil vast turns above the Circle, discerned by those who draw near.$(br2)When your ritual activates successfully, the $(obelisk)BarrierCircleSky.png$(reset) texture will manifest high above your circle, creating a visible sign of the ancient magic at work.$(br2)This celestial manifestation serves as both a beacon of power and a visual anchor for your ritual's stability.

pages.title: Ritual Validation
pages.text: $(ritual)Important:$(reset) Not all obelisk configurations create valid rituals!$(br2)$(b)Critical Requirements:$(reset)$(br)$(obelisk)North Obelisk:$(reset) Must be variant 4, 5, or 7 to define ritual type$(br)$(obelisk)East Obelisk:$(reset) Must match the ritual type (1-2 for barriers, 5-6 for effects)$(br)$(obelisk)South & West:$(reset) Must be variants 1, 2, or 3 for strength and regeneration$(br2)$(dim)If any obelisk is variant 0 (blank), the ritual will fail to activate.$(br2)The ancient texts warn: 'Only the complete pattern awakens the sleeping power. Incomplete runes bring only silence.'
